name: Soul Detective (itch)
description:
The spirit world is where our heavenly bodies meet and deal with unfinished business on its way to leave Earth. In this world we are Loumis, a detective soul in charge of solving these problems and helping souls in their transition.

In this game Loumis is in charge of solving 6 (six) mysteries at Park da Pas. But, unfortunately, lost souls have very vague memories of how to solve their problems. Now, through the clues, Soul Detective is responsible for helping lost souls.
CAUTION, intermediaries in the spirit world can interfere with your cases.

Movement- WASD
Rotate camera - Q / E
Interact - F
Skip Dialogue - Space
Pause - Esc
